text: Alfredo Landa Areta (March 3, 1933 - May 9, 2013) was a Spanish actor. Landa was born in Pamplona, Navarre, Spain. He finished his pre-university studies in San Sebasti√°n. He then began university studies on Law, where he began to work with university school groups. He left university to work in the theater. Landa was married to Maite Imaz Aramendi until his death in 2013. They had three children. Landa died on May 9, 2013 in Madrid, Spain, aged 80. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1933 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Spanish movie actors Category:Spanish television actors Category:Spanish stage actors Category:Spanish voice actors Category:People from Pamplona
title: Alfredo Landa
